my portfolio

Educational Cultural Experience

As the marketing executive of the education institution, I mainly developed new clients, planned events and promoted my company through social media. As a good team player, I always provide quality work and service to the internal team and external clients. My roles also involved in-depth research and generally lots of writing and details to go into the presentations and reports.
